content: the cat is 12 1/2 inches tall and i used a 3mm hook with caron simply soft yarn what you need to know to make this pattern us -single_crochet -double_crochet -increase -decrease -chain -slip_stitch -color changing -magic_ring please note that you do not have the permission to copy sell or redistribute the pattern in any way you have the permission to sell finished products made from this pattern as long as you give credit to the designer this pattern was tested but let me know if you find any error
